title: Only leaders of independent parties attending discussion with President: sources
body_lines: The discussion called by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa this morning will see the participation of the 11 political parties which withdrew from the government and now function independently, sources told Ada Derana.

Earlier today, it was reported that a meeting has been scheduled for this morning (April 29) with the constituent political parties of the ruling faction. However, according to sources, only the 11 independent parties are attending the said meeting.
The focus of the meeting is likely to fall on the establishment of an interim all-party government. Accordingly, suggestions of party leaders will be sought on the matter.
